detectors.description:

function isContract(address account) internal view returns (bool) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PineappleFinance.sol)#174

detectors.description:
PineappleFinance (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PineappleFinance.sol#215-232) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- IERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PineappleFinance.sol#8)
	- IERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PineappleFinance.sol#6)
	- IERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PineappleFinance.sol#9)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PineappleFinance.sol#52-54)
	- IERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PineappleFinance.sol#5)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PineappleFinance.sol#48-51)
	- IERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PineappleFinance.sol#7)
	- ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PineappleFinance.sol#59-63)
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PineappleFinance.sol#42-44)
	- IERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PineappleFinance.sol#4)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PineappleFinance.sol#55-58)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PineappleFinance.sol#45-47)
